review: This product came very quickly and has a lot of potential for growth. If you are on the edge considering getting this item, do yourself a favor and get it. As well as using Netflix or Hulu for streaming, you can cast videos from YouTube on your mobile device with your friends and family.Pros: A device with a lot of potentialGreat and cheap way to watch movies or streamWide variety of supportBeing able to cast a tab from a browserPlex capabilities (look it up if you are curious)Cons:If you are going to use this in a place with a changing wifi password, prepare to spend 5-10 minutes each time you change the wireless code. This can be irritating.No security, anyone on your network can cast to you, leading to some disruption possibilities.Conclusion: Go for it, this might be just what you need, if this isn't what you want, you can return it. Amazon Support is great like that!
